properties.entry: update sc_amazon_order set tn_status = '2' where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND (tn_status is null or tn_status = '')

update sc_amazon_order set tn_status = '1' where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND tn_status = '2'

INSERT INTO sc_amazon_order_download_details (id,order_id,download_id) SELECT order_number as id ,order_id ,'{@#downloadId#}' as download_id FROM sc_amazon_order where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND tn_status='2'

select sc_amazon_order.* , (select track_number from sc_order_result where sc_order_result.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) as TN from sc_amazon_order where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND tn_status='2'
INSERT INTO sc_amazon_order_download ( ID, NAME, FEED, ACCOUNT_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR ) VALUES ( '{@#name#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#feed#}', '{@#accountId#}', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}' )

SELECT s1.ORDER_ID, s1.ORDER_ITEM_ID, s1.ORDER_NUMBER, s1.SKU, s2.TRACK_NUMBER, s2.SHIPPING_FEE, s2.TRANSACTION_ID, s2.MAIL_CLASS, s2.POSTMARK_DATE, s2.TRANSACTION_DATETIME, s2.GROUP_CODE, s2.INSURED_VALUE, s2.INSURANCE_FEE, s2.STATUS, s2.LENGTH, s2.WIDTH, s2.HEIGHT, s2.BILLED_WEIGHT, s2.ACTUAL_WEIGHT, s3.REAL_SKU, s3.NAME as REAL_NAME, s3.IMAGE_URL FROM sc_amazon_order s1 LEFT JOIN sc_order_result s2 ON s1.order_id = s2.order_id left join sc_real_product s3 on s3.real_sku in ( select s.real_sku from sc_real_product_rel s where s.sku = s1.sku and s.account_id = s1.account_id ) WHERE account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sc_amazon_order_status WHERE sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' AND sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = s1.order_id ) AND (tn_status IS NULL OR tn_status = '')

SELECT s1.ORDER_ID, s1.ORDER_ITEM_ID, s1.ORDER_NUMBER, s1.SKU, s2.TRACK_NUMBER, s2.SHIPPING_FEE, s2.TRANSACTION_ID, s2.MAIL_CLASS, s2.POSTMARK_DATE, s2.TRANSACTION_DATETIME, s2.GROUP_CODE, s2.INSURED_VALUE, s2.INSURANCE_FEE, s2.STATUS, s2.LENGTH, s2.WIDTH, s2.HEIGHT, s2.BILLED_WEIGHT, s2.ACTUAL_WEIGHT, s3.REAL_SKU, s3.NAME as REAL_NAME, s3.IMAGE_URL FROM sc_amazon_order s1 LEFT JOIN sc_order_result s2 ON s1.order_id = s2.order_id left join sc_real_product s3 on s3.real_sku in ( select s.real_sku from sc_real_product_rel s where s.sku = s1.sku and s.account_id = s1.account_id ) WHERE account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND tn_status = '1'
